Job Title: Senior Product Marketing Manager

Location: San Jose, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Introduction

Introduction to the job

Director of product management

Role And Responsibilities

We are seeking a San Jose based Director of product management to lead product management and marketing of HMI’s eBeam inspection products. This position will report into the Sr Director of marketing at HMI in San Jose.

In this role, you will develop and own the market strategy and roadmap of HMI’s eBeam inspection products. This will be a critical position requiring strong leadership and creativity to strengthen HMI as a key player in the competitive eBeam inspection market.

This requires a highly motivated, talented and flexible leader with adept technical and business knowledge, excellent communication and presentation skills, and strong organizational, management and team-building capabilities.


Develop a comprehensive understanding of key customer requirements in semiconductor markets: understand challenges the customer faces, the technical requirements for our products, and the value represented by our solutionUnderstand our position relative to the competition through competitive SWOT analysis and use this understanding to develop marketing and product introduction strategies.Define product roadmaps that clearly establishes HMI’s competitive advantageDevelop marketing plans and product roadmaps to drive product definition, design and development, customer engagements, and market penetration.Evaluate the financial aspects of product developments incl. budgets, expenditures, and projected R&D cost, ROI and profit-and-loss projections.Develop use cases, marketing materials, sales collateral, market communication plans including press releases, launch materials and customer presentations.Customer visits and internal meetings with up to roughly 40% travel (domestic travel: ~10%; International travel ~ 30%)


This position requires access to controlled technology, as defined in the Export Administration Regulations (15 C.F.R.


730, et seq.). Qualified candidates must be legally authorized to access such controlled technology prior to beginning work. Business demands may require ASML to proceed with candidates who are immediately eligible to access controlled technology.


Role And Responsibilities

We are seeking a San Jose based Director marketing manager to lead product management and marketing of HMI’s eBeam inspection products. This position will report into the Sr Director of marketing at HMI in San Jose.

In this role, you will develop and own the market strategy and roadmap of HMI’s eBeam inspection products. This will be a critical position requiring strong leadership and creativity to strengthen HMI as a key player in the competitive eBeam inspection market.

Education And Experience
M.S. and above in electrical engineering, physics, chemical engineering, IC manufacturing, or process technology related fields.Demonstrated successes in product development and marketing strategies in the semiconductor capital equipment industry. Prior experience with semiconductor capital equipment including working knowledge of semiconductor processes and defect inspection is a must. Prior experience in e-beam technology is a plus.Demonstrated experience in bringing products to market successfully.10+ years of experience in the semiconductor industry.7+ years of experience in product marketing and product management with working knowledge in defect inspection, process control, and yield engineering.Experience managing product management/marketing teams.Critical problem solver with demonstrated experience in leading organizations while influencing cross-functional teams to drive product development, penetration, and adoption.Demonstrated leadership in influencing and managing change.Strong motivation to win with a can-do attitude.Ability to apply a P&L perspective to strategies, execution plans, and decision-making.


Skills
Can observe and respond to people and situations and interact with others encountered in the course of work.Can learn and apply new information or skills.Must be able to read and interpret data, information, and documents.Strong customer focus and commitment to customer satisfaction through prioritization, quality, efficiency and professionalism.Ability to complete assignments with attention to detail and high degree of accuracy.Proven ability to perform effectively in a demanding environment with changing workloads.Result driven-demonstrate ownership and accountability.Identifies bottlenecks and drives improvements.Work independently or as part of a team and follow through on assignments with minimal supervision.Demonstrate open, clear, concise and professional communication.Ability to establish and maintain cooperative working relationships with co-workers and customer.Work according to a strict set of procedures within the provided timelines.
